divs: sighting detailsi was doing my make up by the window, think i was getting ready for work. i was looking out the window at the clear blue sky then looked at the leaves of a tree in my garden and suddenly notice just next to the outline of the tree was a silver\metalic looking triangle, perfectly still in the air, isosceles shaped, don't know how big it was as i couldn't tell how far away it was, perhaps a couple of millimeters in the sky from my eye line. i just stared at it for a while wondering what it could be, i was sort of holding my breath and heart beating fast with excitement as it was bizarre and i couldn't think of what it could be. after a while of staring at it i thought to myself, that there could be any number of explanations, there was no one else in the house to tell and i certainly didn't plan on telling people i was seeing things in the sky as i would sound like i was mentally ill. i looked away to continue getting ready, still thinking about it and when i looked up again it was gone, so i don't know if it disappeared or moved or was ever even really there.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sale
This sighting has never been favorited.
